Text: Thanks for this! I'll comment on quality after I've watched it, but give me a few weeks.
This is a brilliant undertaking.  Can we get a standard quality version to go along with it?
This isn't the entire season, several episodes are missing. Also, the episode titles are all incorrect.

Eyezonme, this is a re-edit so that the story moves in chronological order rather than the interwoven way the original cuts were.  Because of that there run times, episode count and titles are different.
My mistake! I just read about these 'chronological' fan edits
